content:
Hi! I just added the characteristic function, mgf, and cgf to the binomial distribution here -- #34866

Also, the github actions bot added a large-import tag to my PR. Should I separate the section I added into its own file so the imports are separated?
No, or not yet - that label is a signal for reviewers to take a look at the imports, and they'll tell you if a change is needed
Hey I had noticed another PR #28248 that had better api for binomial measures so I decided to close the previous one and open another one built on top of that here #35472
I'll probably use this thread to post about any other characteristic function or mgf related PRs that I open
